line: Group Operations Information Security Best Practices
label: heading

line: When creating a document, classify
label: paragraph

line: it by selecting the right classification level *
label: paragraph

line: (Public, Internal, Confidential, Secret) and
label: paragraph

line: determine the list of recipients.
label: paragraph

line: When printing Internal or Confidential
label: paragraph

line: documents, stay beside the printer to avoid
label: paragraph

line: them being disclosed.
label: paragraph

line: S tore confidential documents in a closed locker
label: paragraph

line: or cupboard. Store secret data in
label: paragraph

line: a safe.
label: paragraph

line: Use a confidentiality screen filter when
label: paragraph

line: displaying restricted, or confidential information
label: paragraph

line: on a laptop outside of the office.
label: paragraph

line: Apply the clean desk policy and don’t leave
label: paragraph

line: “Internal, Confidential, Secret” documents
label: paragraph

line: unattended on the desk when you leave the
label: paragraph

line: office.
label: paragraph

line: Use shared drives carefully: Restrict access
label: paragraph

line: rights for specific user access and encrypt (with
label: paragraph

line: 7zip or Winzip or O365) confidential or secret
label: paragraph

line: data. Save files in the appropriate folders.
label: paragraph

line: Don’t send confidential information via email in
label: paragraph

line: clear text, Encrypt (with 7zip or Winzip or O365) it
label: paragraph

line: in a document attached to the email. Don’t send
label: paragraph

line: an encrypted document and its password in the
label: paragraph

line: same e-mail.
label: paragraph

line: Don’t send professional AXA data to personal or
label: paragraph

line: mailboxes. Always check the list of recipients to
label: paragraph

line: ensure only authorized people may gain access
label: paragraph

line: to the information.
label: paragraph

line: Use the corporate AXA secure file transfer
label: paragraph

line: service: ONE DRIVE or SharePoint.
label: paragraph

line: Never use alternative information sharing
label: paragraph

line: services, not approved by Group Operations,
label: paragraph

line: such as dropbox, wetransfer, livebox…
label: paragraph

line: Do not expose any details of your job and
label: paragraph

line: missions at AXA on social media.
label: paragraph

line: Refrain from publishing classified non-public
label: paragraph

line: business information on the internet
label: paragraph

line: Always transfer suspicious emails to the security
label: paragraph

line: team. Avoid in opening files as attachments
label: paragraph

line: whose origin is not safe. Beware of phishing
label: paragraph

line: emails.
label: paragraph

line: Do NOT use non-corporate applications
label: paragraph

line: to store confidential or secret data on
label: paragraph

line: corporate mobile devices. Immediately notify
label: paragraph

line: your security department in case of device loss
label: paragraph

line: or theft.
label: paragraph

line: Always use shredders or secured
label: paragraph

line: containers to destroy internal,
label: paragraph

line: confidential or secret documents
label: paragraph

line: (paper, removable media, …).
label: paragraph

line: In case of doubt or suspicion
label: paragraph

line: of information loss, leakage or theft,
label: paragraph

line: immediately contact security team.
label: paragraph

line: Avoid putting sensitive information/data in
label: paragraph

line: email objects or file/folder names: To ensure
label: paragraph

line: only authorized people may gain access to the
label: paragraph

line: information.
label: paragraph

line: * Four classification levels available:
label: heading

line: Secret Any information the disclosure of which could
label: paragraph

line: seriously damage the essential interests of AXA
label: paragraph

line: Any information which may be communicated only
label: paragraph

line: to the persons directly concerned (and clearly
label: paragraph

line: Confidential defined) and the unwanted disclosure of which
label: paragraph

line: could significantly harm an AXA project, activity
label: paragraph

line: or entity
label: paragraph

line: Any information which may circulate only within
label: paragraph

line: Internal AXA and may be distributed only on a need-
label: paragraph

line: to-know basis
label: paragraph

line: Any information which may be usually publicly
label: paragraph

line: Public
label: paragraph

line: accessible and the disclosure of which does not
label: paragraph

line: harm the interests of AXA
label: paragraph

line: Cyber Defense/Global Security Services: ? go_cd_global_security_services@axa.com
label: paragraph

line: Internal
label: paragraph
